name: Applied Asian Languages
tag_list: translation-services, translation-company, localisation, localization, translation-agency, asian-translation
overview:
Applied Asian Languages offers professional translation and localization services specialising in Asian inclusive languages (e.g. Chinese to English, English to Chinese). Based in Singapore, we provide our services to both private and corporate customers worldwide.

Our network of translators are located in countries including the UK, USA, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, China, India, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Indonesia and more. Our professional translators only translate into their native language.

Aside from selecting the most capable translators in the industry, we pride ourselves on carrying out your translation or localization work with accuracy, professionalism and always at a competitive price.
